attributes.action: Eye tests for everyone not just over 70s
attributes.additional_details: We all have varying vision no matter what age.  Why should over 70s be singled out for specific testing & then banned from driving if they fail.  Test everyone’s vision with the same test.  This is ageism.
attributes.background: The government are planning eye testing for everyone over 70 & banning those who fail from driving.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We are not sure when/how often would you like these tests to take place on everyone.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
